title: COBALT已开放下载
author: :spgbigfan:
txt_content:
本帖最后由 bobby825 于 2016-2-3 12:14 编辑 


Cobalt is available to download for Xbox 360, Xbox One, and Steam for Windows. It costs $19.99 / ?15:99 / ?19.99. Stop reading this and download it right now!
Cobalt已开放Xbox 360，Xbox One，和Windows上Steam的下载。它的价格为$19.99 / ?15:99 / ?19.99。别看了，快下载去！

Still here? OK - here’s some information to help you make a more informed decision.
还在这呢？好吧——这里有些信息来帮助你做出更明智的选择。

Our new launch trailer!
我们新的登录预告！
点此到B站观看[感谢搬运]

A copy-and-pasted description from our Steam store page
一份从Steam商店复制粘贴过来的介绍
“Forget everything you’ve learned about combat. Cobalt’s slo-mo mechanic lets you perform moves that other games can’t comprehend. Discover the secrets of a distant colony in a cosmic campaign, take on challenges and rule the leaderboards, or face off against others in local and online multiplayer.”“忘了你知道的关于战斗的一切吧。Cobalt的慢动作机制能让你施展出其它游戏无法想象的动作。探寻茫茫宇宙中一个遥远殖民地的秘密，接受挑战，统治排行榜，或者是对抗其它土著和在线玩家吧。”
A press-release type thing
一篇新闻文章
STOCKHOLM, Sweden, January 2nd, 2016.
瑞典，斯德哥尔摩，2016.2.2

Leading developer of video games and reasonable, friendly people, Oxeye Game Studio, are delighted to premiere COBALT - an awesome video game published by Mojang AB, creators of Minecraft.
视频游戏的领导开发者，真心友善的好人，Oxeye游戏工作室，非常高兴地推出了COBALT——一款炫酷的视频游戏，由Mojang AB发行，即Minecraft的制作商。

Jens Bergsten, developer on Cobalt said: “I’m super excited. I’m not sure if it’s a spoiler or not, but the ending of the story has potential to put Cobalt into ‘cult classic’ status.”
Jeb（你懂的），Cobalt的开发者，说道：“我非常激动。我不确定这是不是剧透，但故事的末尾已经隐秘地把Cobalt放在了‘邪教经典’的位置上。”

“It’s great that the game is finally done,” said Daniel Brynolf, another developer on Cobalt.
“游戏终于制作完成真是棒极了，”Daniel Brynolf说道，他是Cobalt的另一位开发者。

“I don’t quite know what I’m going to do with the rest of my life,” said Pontus Hammarberg, yet another Cobalt developer. “I’ll probably continue to work on Cobalt.”
“我不是很清楚余生要干什么了，”Pontus Hammarberg说道，他也是Cobalt的另一位开发者。“我大概还会继续开发Cobalt。”

Now go download! Have fun! See you online!
现在去下载吧！好好玩！线上见！

Owen - @bopogamel
